entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
